verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. stocks] [V: were] [ARG2: under pressure] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Trump issued fresh tariff threats at China] . The U.S. is eyeing an additional $ 200 billion in tariffs on Chinese goods .

U.S. stocks were under pressure Tuesday after [ARG0: President Trump] [V: issued] [ARG1: fresh tariff threats] [ARG2: at China] . The U.S. is eyeing an additional $ 200 billion in tariffs on Chinese goods .
